messages.title: A future fair for all
messages.content: Labour has protected our economy through the global financial crisis. Left to the Tories the downturn could have been more severe with greater unemployment and less support for struggling families.

messages.title: Heather says....
messages.content: Make sure you vote Labour and give James the support he deserves.

messages.title: Achievements under Labour
messages.content: CHILDREN'S CENTRES: Using government money, two 'Sure Start' children's centres have opened in Mole Valley. They provide health advice and support for young children and their families.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: James Dove supports 'Be Active, Be Healthy', and encourages swimming, cycling, walking in the countryside and other physical activities.
James Dove will ensure that all GP surgeries in Mole Valley are open at least one evening a week or at the weekend.
James Dove has announced a first time buyers' and tenants' support bill to establish a right of first refusal for them.
James Dove will support Labour proposals to ensure that every child leaves primary school confident in literary and numeracy.

issues.economy: Labour has protected our economy through the global financial crisis.
issues.education: Labour has doubled the annual amount spent per pupil, from £2,900 in 1997 to £5,850 today.

housing.content: James Dove has announced a first time buyers' and tenants' support bill to establish a right of first refusal for them.

politicalExperience.role: YOUR PARLIAMENTARY LABOUR CANDIDATE FOR MOLE VALLEY

endorsements.endorsement: Make sure you vote Labour and give James the support he deserves.
